annotation_previews.body:
Hayley really loves him but the guy doesn’t realize it, and never will, as he cannot “decode” her thoughts.



Also, it’s a specific reference to ‘Twilight’. Bella’s thoughts can’t be read by Edward, despite the fact he can read the thoughts of others.

Hayley sees something in this person, although it may lead to problems for her, she still wants it to be true.



Also a final Twilight reference. Edward, being a vampire, is naturally inclined to kill and drink Bella’s blood. In the film he mentions that Bella smelled particularly “delicious” for lack of better phrase, and tried to frighten Bella off, showing off his supernatural strength and saying that he could kill her at any time, even by accident. Bella is fully aware that Edward could kill her at any time but refuses to turn away, leading to 4 more movies the world loves to hate.
Hayley is contemplating what she has done, questioning the person she is with, and wondering if they are ready for the world to see what they have done.

body.html:
[Verse 1]
How can I decide what's right
When you're clouding up my mind?
I can't win your losing fight
All the time
Not gonna ever own what's mine
When you're always taking sides
But you won't take away my pride
No, not this time
Not this time

[Hook]
How did we get here
When I used to know you so well? Yeah
How did we get here?
Well, I think I know how

[Verse 2]
The truth is hiding in your eyes
And it's hanging on your tongue
Just boiling in my blood
But you think that I can't see
What kind of man that you are
If you're a man at all
Well, I will figure this one out
On my own (I'm screaming, "I love you so")
On my own (My thoughts you can't decode)

[Hook]
How did we get here
When I used to know you so well? Yeah
How did we get here?
Well, I think I know how

[Guitar Solo]

[Bridge]
Do you see what we've done?
We've gone and made such fools of ourselves
Do you see what we've done?
We've gone and made such fools of ourselves

[Hook]
How did we get here
When I used to know you so well? Yeah, yeah, yeah
How did we get here
When I used to know you so well?

[Modified Hook]
I think I know
I think I know

[Outro]
There is something I see in you
It might kill me, but I want it to be true

song.full_title: Where the Lines Overlap (acoustic) by Paramore

Normality does not go with me, I’m addicted to the lyrics that spill one’s heart away.

I’m a Colombian music lover, mechatronic engineer, guitarist, and songwriter. Everyone’s welcome to listen to my Spotify and message me if you need any help on Genius (or just want to talk about music).

Green Day
Blink-182
Paramore

user.name: FGV

user.about_me_summary:
If I rejected your annotation, I would love to explain why I did so! Shoot me a message and I’ll drop some constructive criticism!

  


Sixteen-year-old boarding school student from India who loves to play the drums and the Tabla. Loves listening to rock, EDM, metal and some pop. Speaks English, Hindi und ein bisschen Deutsch (and a little bit German). Studying IB English Literature and History in school.

P.S. Yes, I was the one who took my current profile picture (on a school trip to Antarctica!)

  


Milestones:
Joined Genius: August 2017
Made Editor: 14th November, 2017 (s/o ewokABdevito)
Empath’s Emporium: 15th November, 2017
1000 IQ: 19th November, 2017
5000 IQ: 13th December, 2017
10,000 IQ: 16th December, 2017
15,000 IQ: 18th December, 2017
20,000 IQ: 19th December, 2017
Won Red-removing Sprint: 20th December, 2017
25,000 IQ: 29th December, 2017
30,000 IQ: 5th January, 2018
Genius of the Month: January 2018
40,000 IQ: 2nd February, 2018
Created with GeniusGraph (open source)
Users I’ve helped become editor:
@Vapify | @schwiftymachine | @TheLabRat190
Definitely hit me up if you’re interested too!

  


I enjoy listening to:

Rock and pop: ONE OK ROCK, Paramore, Linkin Park, Caravan Palace, Cartel, ACDC, Disturbed, Metallica, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Of Monsters and Men, System of a Down, Bon Jovi, Green Day, Guns N' Roses, Milky Chance and a bunch of others.

EDM: KSHMR, Pegboard Nerds, Vicetone, Krewella, R3HAB, 3LAU, DVBBS, Shaun Frank, Grant, Borgeous and, again, a bunch of others.

Drummers: Benny Greb, Anika Nilles, Chris Coleman

Lit Genius: Poetry!

Hit me up if you need any help with any of these!

  


I say that I don’t have an ego, but I’m actually just satisfying my ego by saying that…
user.name: sitzpinkler

body.html:
Hayley Williams said in a statement regarding the title of the song:

[“Decode”] is about the building tension, awkwardness, anger and confusion between [story characters] Bella and Edward. Bella’s is the only mind Edward can’t read and I feel like that’s a big part of the first book and one of the obstacles for them to overcome. It’s one added tension that makes the story even better.
body.markdown:
Hayley Williams said in a [statement](http://www.songfacts.com/detail.php?id=13127) regarding the title of the song:
>["Decode"] is about the building tension, awkwardness, anger and confusion between [story characters] Bella and Edward. Bella's is the only mind Edward can't read and I feel like that's a big part of the first book and one of the obstacles for them to overcome. It's one added tension that makes the story even better.

year-end list 2016

my genius history:

February 2015: edded by peter nowogrodzki, aka XenaWarriorPrincess
December 6, 2015: Drew_Harvie becomes editor
December 19, 2015: 50k IQ!
January 12, 2016: my meta tates confirmed better than verified tates by diplo, tinashe, skrillex, and pusha t
January 23, 2016: kinik (and vinylzombie_mcr) gets me to 60k iq
February 19, 2016: empath upvotes some meta tates (?) to get me to 70k
March 30, 2016: annotating unc’s ncaa history gets me to 80k :)
April 1, 2016: went to hq (not even lying ask niday), it was dope
May 10, 2016: ewok upvotes me and gets me to 90k :) thanks ewok
May 24, 2016: cocochase becomes editor!!!
May 27, 2016: i got modded by the amazing streetlights. love you all, and here’s to really making pop genius pop again :)
June 15, 2016: the god mod Freeus upvotes me to 100k at like 1:30 AM ❤️
November 2017: i came out of hiding to work on year-end list and became the #1 scholar on “All I Want For Christmas Is You!!”
February 19, 2018: vinylzombie_mcr, exactly two years after i earned 70k and just over two years before she upvoted me to 60k, upvoted me to 150k!! it’s been a year and a half to get my last 50k, versus my first 50k taking seven months (and happening exactly 26 months ago) and second 50k taking also seven months. so shoutout to all of y'all, mad love ❤️
accepted_by.name: Babu Sea

description.html: This song was the bonus track on the international edition of Paramore’s 2009 album Brand New Eyes. This song was also included on the soundtrack for the 2008 movie Twilight, as the band revealed they were fans of the series and the music video and the lyrics contain references to the film, especially in the style and narrative of the video.
description.markdown: This song was the bonus track on the international edition of [Paramore](/artists/Paramore)'s 2009 album *Brand New Eyes.* This song was also included on the soundtrack for the 2008 movie *Twilight,* as the band revealed they were fans of the series and the music video and the lyrics contain references to the film, especially in the style and narrative of the video.

user.about_me_summary:
I’m a student from the UK, I love writing, music, Paramore and anything else creative like modelling (figurines and the like) and painting, digital art on Photoshop. I write poetry and am in the process of my first novel. I study Journalism&Creative Writing (Joint BA Honours) with Politics and Law.
My favourite artists are Paramore, Hayley Williams, Fall Out Boy, Lorde, Halsey, Lana Del Rey
